name: The name of this room
width: The width of this room in metres as an integer
length: The length of this room in metres as an integer

objects.name: The name of this object
objects.x: The number of metres across the room where this object lives. Should be less than `width`
objects.y: The number of metres into the room where this object lives. Should be less than `length`

exits.name: The name of this exit
exits.x: The number of metres across the room where this exit lives. Should be less than `width`
exits.y: The number of metres into the room where this exit lives. Should be less than `length`
